summary: Experienced front-end developer with over 3 years of expertise in building dynamic, responsive web applications using Angular, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Proficient in modern web technologies and focused on delivering clean, efficient, and user-friendly solutions.

responsibilities: Developed and maintained Angular applications with a focus on responsive design and performance.
Collaborated with UX/UI teams to enhance the user experience.
Implemented reusable components and services using Angular 17.
Optimized loading times and improved overall site performance.
Assisted in developing and maintaining client websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Worked with a team to design and implement new features.
Ensured cross-browser compatibility and responsive designs.

projects.name: Freelancing Website
projects.description: Developed a freelancing website using Angular 17 for front-end and Node.js for the backend, handling user registration, project posting, and payments.

projects.name: Vercel Serverless API
projects.description: Created a serverless API using Vercel and Node.js for managing form submissions and data processing.
